pulltitle: add note to all pages that site is archived
pullsbody: This branch adds a note to all pages that the Mozilla Labs website is archived. It looks like this: The style comes from the note on archived pages of the mozilla.org website, f.e. http://www-archive.mozilla.org/unix/remote.html. I'm doing this to resolve bug https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1199848. I've run into trouble building the site locally (using the instructions in INSTALL.md), but I've tested by using developer tools to insert the chunk of HTML into the appropriate place on various pages of the live site to confirm that it looks as expected. I embedded the style into the HTML in this case (instead of putting it into an external stylesheet) because the site is defunct, and this is (presumably) the last change we will make to it, so I optimized for simplicity over maintainability.
pull_repo_desc: DECOMMISSIONED: Home of innovation projects at Mozilla
pull_commit_message: add note to all pages that site is archived

pulltitle: Add ORM, site, and upstream caching.
pullsbody:
Add cache-machine back to projects. Add new django-cache-machine submodule. 
Update cache test to be more robust. Activate django anonymous-only site
cache. Fix bug 743332 743244.

This site is a perfect candidate for anonymous-only full site caching
since a huge percentage of our visitors are anonymous, and the content
rarely changes. The middleware also handles sending the correct headers
for upstream caches, so most visitors should only hit the pages once.
pull_repo_desc: DECOMMISSIONED: Home of innovation projects at Mozilla
pull_commit_message:
Add ORM, site, and upstream caching.

Add cache-machine back to projects.
Add new django-cache-machine submodule.
Update cache test to be more robust.
Activate django anonymous-only site cache.
Fix bug 743332 743244.

pulltitle: Add ORM, site, and upstream caching.
pullsbody:
Add cache-machine back to projects. Add new django-cache-machine submodule. 
Update cache test to be more robust. Activate django anonymous-only site
cache. Fix bug 743332 743244.

This site is a perfect candidate for anonymous-only full site caching
since a huge percentage of our visitors are anonymous, and the content
rarely changes. The middleware also handles sending the correct headers
for upstream caches, so most visitors should only hit the pages once.
pull_repo_desc: DECOMMISSIONED: Home of innovation projects at Mozilla

pullsbody:
Fixed a minor bug in the browserid backend. When port is not 80, we can't treat qs like a dictionary, since it is a string.

Put logic for port detection before urlencoding.

pulltitle: Removing class used to recalutate parent height
pullsbody:
The recalculation of heights lead of choppy display issues so removed for now - I think with real data the visual effect wouldn't have been as intended anyways.

Easy to put back in, refactor if needed.
pull_repo_desc: DECOMMISSIONED: Home of innovation projects at Mozilla
pull_commit_message: The recalculation of heights lead of choppy display issues so removed for now
